==== CPU Throttling Storm ====

This sequence is NOT verified at the moment.

The bug is described in https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/rsyslog/+bug/453444

1. Get linux image sources:
  <pre>
apt-get source linux-image-`uname -r`
  </pre>

2. Patch the sources with the file from 3967684006f30c253bc6d4a6604d1bad4a7fc672 and b417c9fd8690637f0c91479435ab3e2bf450c038 combined:
  <pre>
wget http://patchwork.kernel.org/patch/49265/raw/ -o /tmp/cleanup.patch
wget http://patchwork.kernel.org/patch/49266/raw/ -o /tmp/fix-storm.patch
cd linux-`uname -r`
patch -p1 -i /tmp/cleanup.patch
patch -p1 -i /tmp/fix-storm.patch
  </pre>
3. disable CONFIG_DEBUG_INFO via make config/xconfig, whatever (so that your initrd does not end up being 60Mb file)
4. Clean the build directory
  <pre>
make-kpkg clean
  </pre>
4. Build the sources
  <pre>
makeroot make-kpkg --initrd --append-to-version=-bug453444 --revision=v2 kernel-image
  </pre>
